mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BX_PROVIDEO ( VIDEO_URL, MEMBER_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATER_ID, PROVIDEO_ORDER ) VALUES ( #{videoUrl} , #{memberId}, 0 , now() , #{createrId} , #{ProVideoOrder} )
